remarks:
The product of two positive reals is positive.  Axiom 21 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-mulgt0 .  Normally new proofs would use ~ axmulgt0 .  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) 

---

 The product of two positive reals is positive.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axpre-mulgt0 .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: ax-pre-mulgt0 $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( ( 0 <RR A /\ 0 <RR B ) -> 0 <RR ( A x. B ) ) ) $.
